amendment.description: An amendment numbered 34 printed in Part B of House Report 115-712 to increase the amount of funding for Supportive Services for Veterans Families by $2 million offset by a reduction of a $2.5 million in the funding for the VA's information Technology Systems.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A065) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A065) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A065) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A065) Agreed to by voice vote.
